111.content:
The girls went down the main hall. Doors to both sides would open to drawing rooms, dining rooms, kitchen and storage rooms. The hall ended in a door that was locked. Whether it would continue behind the door or just open to the final room on the ground floor the girls could not identify. A wooden staircase led up to the first floor. Sarah, Anna and Megan looked at each other, shrugged their shoulders, and went up. Each step yielded a cranking that would wake anyone or anything within the building. The noise of three young girls moving up the staircase was immense.

Sarah, who went up first, stopped half way. The other two girls almost ran into her. Sarah pointed upstairs. The twilight from windows out of sight barely allowed to spot a large cat sitting on the edge of the landing. Her green eyes shone like little stars in the twilight. Although three girls were coming up this way, the cat did not seem to go away. It just sat there. Carefully the girls moved towards the lending. When they were only a few steps away from the cat on the landing, the animal suddenly got to its legs, its back arched into a hump, and a surprisingly loud hiss came from the now open mouth. Sarah tried to shoo the cat away, but it did not flinch. Carefully the girls stepped over the cat, trying to avoid the still open mouth. When they did this, their bare legs and ankles came within reach of the cat's tail. They did not talk to each other about it later. Otherwise they would have noticed that the cat took effort to briefly touch each leg with its bushy tail.

The lending seemed to be in the center of another hall that mirrored the one on the ground floor. Megan proceeded to go left, followed by her friends. She found a number of single or double bedrooms, dressed in varying fashion over the last two centuries. Some looked rather old and dusty, while others were almost of the style of a princess' bedroom. They found a beautifully styled and slightly larger bedroom with a wide bed, a wardrobe, even four seats next to a long tea table and a gold framed mirror. Anna decided that if they did not find anything better they should make this room their home base and possible bedroom.

Anna reluctantly decided to keep going. Her phone, being new, was just too expensive for her to replace right now. "I'll keep going," she says to the empty room.

Anna hears a faint scrape to her left, and turns towards it. A small table has appeared, with her phone sitting on it. Anna immediately realizes if she wants her phone, she'll have to make it through the ticklish air to get to it. She tentatively takes a step toward the table, immediately feeling the resistance of the feathery air as she tries to walk forward. A glorious peal of laughter escapes her lips as she feels hundreds of feathers tickling every inch of her exposed arms and legs, almost making her stop again. She had to have her phone, though, and she focused on it with every bit of resolve she could muster, taking another step towards the table, then another.

As she walks, the air begins to tickle her armpits, and forces it's way into the bottom of her shirt, making it billow out and up. Anna's laughter intensifies as her sensitive bellybutton and armpits are tickled, in addition to her arms and legs. It also flows into her shorts from the top, tickling her hips, then her inner thighs. She's more than halfway to the table now, fighting the laughter even as she takes another step. She can feel the air beginning to flow into her sneakers again, tickling her ankles. Anna has the faintest sensation that she forgot something, but the intense tickling makes her forget the sensation as fast as she had it.

The air makes it's way past her ankles, into the bottoms of her shoes, and Anna laughs even harder as it begins to tickle her soles again, then finally gets between her toes. It's getting harder to focus, the massive amount of tickling almost overloading her senses. She's all of six steps away as the air changes tactics, changing into a mix of the feathery and slimy air, and Anna explodes with laughter. The air is scratching, and rubbing, and caressing, and licking, all at the same time...

Her shorts are working their way down her hips, the tops of her hipbones showing over the waistband, as they continue to sink. With each step, the air pushes harder, and tickles more intensely, as Anna struggles towards her phone. It feels like a tongue is running between each of her toes, and feathers are scratching her arches and heels, armpits, and knees. Her bellybutton is being rubbed by the air and tickled with the very ends of the feathers. The Mistress, watching via her magic, cackles at Anna's glorious peals of laughter, though she is slightly concerned by her drive. She watches with delight as the air manages to push Anna's right arm up, forcing her sleeve over it. Anna doesn't seem to notice as she presses onward.

Anna stumbles the last few steps, kicking first her right Converse, then her left, off without realizing it, as she reaches for her phone. As her hand finally closes around her phone, the tickling abruptly stops, leaving an exhausted, sweaty Anna to gasp for breath as she leans against the table.

It takes her several minutes to catch her breath, her skin tingling as her nerves slowly recover from the massive amount of tickling. As her normal sense of touch is finally restored, and her breathing finally steadies, Anna looks at her phone and grins, then tucks it in her pocket. She'd gotten it back! She goes to take a step towards the exit, and stops as her bare heel thuds against the wood floor. Anna looked down, first in surprise, then in dawning horror, as her bare toes wiggle against the floor. She looks around, and finally realizes her shoes are gone.

Another note sits on the table, which says, "You know the rules. Stay, or leave! Your choice!" Anna groans as she realizes she probably should have just left her phone behind. At this point, she's sweaty, completely exhausted, and sorely tempted to just leave, but she now knows the ticklish secrets the mansion holds...

112331222122121111221111111122.content:
The noise takes the girls by surprise, the Mistress's comment about the monsters now not being afraid of them echoing in Anna'a mind. She bolts to her feet, looking for the source of the noise, and says, "Guys, we have to go NOW!" Without hesitating to hear their responses, or even to get her left shoe on properly, she heads off down the path again. Megan and Sarah's complaints die on their lips as they realize they have to stick together with Anna, and they hurry to catch up.

Meanwhile, the monsters can feel that the socks no longer protect the girls, and they begin to follow them. However, they can tell the girls are somewhat close to a sanctuary room. They decide to continue to make noise at random, and hopefully drive the girls farther from the room, before they pounce.

Anna explains to Megan and Sarah about how the socks were protecting them from the monsters, and that they should try to get to the safe room. Another howl in the distance punctuates Anna's explanation, driving the girls onward as quickly as they can walk. It isn't long before their rapid pace begins to cause problems for Anna and Sarah.

Anna is the first to have a problem. She'd been dragging her left foot with every step, since she'd simply smashed the back of her left shoe beneath her heel, turning her converse into a very loose sneaker mule. She'd kicked her shoe several feet down the path, the glorious peals of her laughter as her bare sole hit the ground echoing through the labyrinth. It was several minutes before she finally managed to push her foot back into her shoe, the rough material tickling her sole faintly.

Sarah was fighting her own problem. Ever since she'd placed her bare right foot on the ground, she'd had the sensation that something was sliding and dancing against her sole. Her sandal had felt slicker after that, too, and she'd been having some difficulty keeping it on, which had only gotten worse with every time she'd stepped out of it. Again, her right sandal shot off her foot, landing almost twenty feet down the path, and, again, Sarah was almost immobilized by the ticklishness of her foot, before she finally got her sandal on again. She really wished she had chosen sandals with a heel strap right about now.

At this moment, the girls hit a 'T' intersection, and could go left or right. Anna really wanted to fix her left shoe, but another roar resounded from behind them, sounding closer.

Does Anna think she has the time to fix her shoe? And do the girls find the sanctuary they seek?

She pushed her bare foot back into her shoe, then knelt to tie it properly.

As Anna was busy with that, Megan kept a lookout for the monsters they could hear getting closer. Sarah tried to help, but was distracted by the sensations dancing across her right foot. The rubbing, sliding sensation had intensified yet again, and her sandal felt so slick she didn't know if it was possible to keep it on. It felt...good, though, even if it tickled a bit. Sarah couldn't admit this to Megan or Anna, but she enjoyed the risk of being tickled...

Anna finished fixing her shoe, and the girls were left with a decision to make, as the sounds of the monsters closing grew rather distinct...

The monsters can see her struggles, and they sprint towards her. As Sarah hears them closing, she starts to run faster, knowing she'll just have to risk it. As much as she enjoys the risk of being tickled, she doesn't want to be tickled forever.

Suddenly, a doorway appears before them, and the girls give a ragged cheer. They're so close to safety! Anna and Megan charge ahead, with Sarah close behind. As she picks up her right foot again, her sandal goes flying off, sailing into the distance. Her bare right sole hits the ground again, and Sarah begins laughing hysterically, even as she struggles towards the door, a few neters ahead of her.

Anna and Megan reach the doorway as Sarah's laughter erupts. They turn back in time to see her stumble out of her left sandal as a monster's claw hooks the back of her shirt. They lunge forward, grabbing Sarah's wrists, and try to drag her into the room, as the monsters latch onto her ankles...

112331222122121111221111111122321111.content:
Sarah almost jumped with joy as she removed the tattered remnants of her shirt and shorts, standing in her underwear for a moment before grabbing her chosen clothes.

The crop top she'd found left her midriff bare, and it's lack of sleeves meant her armpits were completely exposed, too. The miniskirt only went to her upper thighs, leaving her legs entirely exposed. What really excited her, though, was the shoes she'd found.

They were a pair of flat sandals, with a couple of quarter-inch wide straps that went over the ball of her foot, just behind her toes, and two more at the heel. The heel straps attached to the sole just in front of her heels, to either side, and were designed to be pulled around the back of her feet, just above her heels. They crossed there, then wound around her ankle a couple of times, and were tied off. The soles were unique, too. They were a very thin piece of leather, maybe 3/8ths of an inch thick. That leather was cut so that it was beneath the balls and toes, then narrowed to a half-inch wide strip under the outside part of her arches, then flared back out beneath her heel. Her arches were completely exposed from both the sides and below!

After winding the straps around her ankles and tying them, Sarah found that there was no way she could tie the sandals tightly enough to keep her heels in contact with the soles of her shoes when she stood on her toes. No matter what, a half-inch gap always appeared beneath her heels. Her only concern was how flimsy they felt. Neither the straps nor the soles felt like they were made for much more than walking around town. She'd have to be careful, or she just might end up barefoot at an inconvenient time.

Grinning, she stepped back out of the clothing room, where Anna and Megan stood. They both looked at her rather skimpy outfit, then Megan said, "Sarah, you really must like being tickled. Seriously, you're going to wear that?"

"They're cute! And cool! And I still have the right to wear what I want!" Anna and Megan both rolled their eyes at that, then turned a bit grim.

"We've decided we should..."

11233122212212111122111111112232111121.content:
The girls settled on the first challenge, though the debate was intense. Megan, who had so far escaped the ticklish menaces of the maze unscathed, was the biggest proponent of it. Anna, who had earned so much of the information they had, was against it. Sarah, secretly delighted at this new, risky turn, had cast the deciding vote, leaving Anna rather annoyed.

"We'll do the first challenge," Sarah announced to the Mistress. There was a brief flicker from by their feet, and all three girls gasped as they suddenly felt the cool, smooth floor beneath their bare soles. "Very well," the Mistress' voice came back to them, "Enjoy your walk!". A faint cackle was heard as her voice faded away.

"I've got a really bad feeling about this," Anna mumbled, as she wiggled her toes against the floor. "It won't be that bad," Megan replied, looking down at her exposed toes. "We just have to stick together."

Sarah looked at both of them, grinned, and said, "Come on! We can't wait here forever." She headed for the door before Anna or Megan could add anything else, and they both hurried to follow her.

Stepping out the door, the girls could feel soft, damp dirt beneath their bare soles. True to the Mistress' word, it didn't tickle them at all, though they could feel just how sensitive their feet had been made. It felt almost like the dirt was caressing their soles.

Looking ahead, the girls could see where an old stone path had run, before parts of it had disappeared into the ground. Muddy puddles littered the patches in between, and grass lined the sides of the trail.

"This doesn't seem so bad," Anna stated, and she led the way down the trail. Sarah and Megan followed, quietly listening as they padded onto the first stone patch, before stopping as they saw the giant muddy swatch between them and the next chunk of pathway.

"There's no way we can jump this," Sarah noted, looking at the nearly 5 meter gap in the stone path. Megan responded, "I'd rather not get my feet all muddy. This is bad enough." She lifted one of her size 8 feet, showing her dusty pink sole to Anna and Sarah. "Let's cut through the grass." Anna shook her head. "The Mistress said the ground won't tickle us. I'm not keen on getting my feet muddy, either, but I'd seriously doubt the grass counts as ground. That would be too easy."

After a brief debate, the girls decide to...
11233122212212111122111111112232111121.title: Do the first challenge

11233122212212111122111111112232111122.content:
Sarah had been the sole dissenting vote, knowing her sandals and clothes were already kind of frail. Anna and Megan had overruled her, commenting that she should have thought of that before choosing such light clothing.

"We'll do the second challenge," Anna announced to the air. There was a brief flicker in the air around them, then the Mistress' voice came to them again. "I look forward to watching you get tickled!" The girls groaned as the voice receded again.

"Well, that's that," Anna said, "Let's do this." Megan and Sarah followed her as she stepped into the next portion of the labyrinth.

Looking forward, they could see that this portion of the labyrinth looked untraveled. The floor was rougher than they were used to, and they could see one spot where it looked to get rather narrow. There also seemed to be random small tunnels dotting the walls.

Before they set off, Anna turned to a small protrusion of rock on the floor. "Let's see what the Mistress meant by 'much less durable.'" Anna gently rubbed the sole of her right shoe on the ground, then equally gently, rubbed the inside of it, next to the ball of her foot, on the protrusion.

She turned so Sarah and Megan could see her shoe, then lifted her foot. All three girls gasped at what they saw. There was a scuff in rubber sole, where Anna had brushed the ball of it against the ground, that looked like she had vigorously rubbed it for an hour or so. Where she'd brushed the side of her foot against the rock, they could see her pink skin through a two-inch split between the sole and cloth upper.

"I really think this was a bad idea," Megan stated, looking at her Nikes. "We're going to have to be really careful, or this could get bad fast."

Sarah swallowed, steeling her nerves. She enjoyed the idea of risk, but this seemed nearly impossible. If she pulled this off, she'd be estatic.

As the girls carefully approached the narrow gap, stepping gently, they could see that the path was just as rough on the other side. Megan volunteered to go first, as she was the tallest, and best-endowed of the three. If she could make it through, Anna and Sarah would be fine. Turning sideways, she began to edge through the gap.

Does she make it through, or get stuck? And what of those tunnels along the walls?

112331222122121111221111111122321111222.content:
Beginning to shimmy her way through the gap, Megan crept through the crevace, one slow step at a time, doing her best not to touch the walls with her clothes. As she advances, the passage got narrower and narrower. Megan felt her back briefly brush the wall, and in a brief moment of panic, quickly shuffled forward, scooting past the skinniest part of the passage with only a couple other light contacts with the walls.

Still being careful, Megan makes it to the other side of the narrow gap, and did a survey of her clothes. Where she scraped the wall on her back left a 4 inch diameter hole, where the fabric of her t-shirt is beginning to fray and fall apart. Her jeans came out mostly unscathed, the fabric thinner in places, but her belt appears to have brushed the wall, leaving it severed and useless, her jeans sliding slightly down her hips. Her Nikes must have brushed the wall in her panic, as her toes in her right shoe are now exposed to the air, the upper marerial completely gone. Her left shoe has a large hole in the heel, barely keeping Megan's foot from slipping out now with each step. The soles have also worn away a good deal, and are quite thin.

Giving a sigh of relief and frustration, she waves at Anna and Sarah to come on through. "You should be fine! I got through with only a little difficulty," Megan yelled back through the passage. Looking at each other, Anna nods back at Sarah. "My turn next, I suppose," she declares, as she enters the passage...
112331222122121111221111111122321111222.title: It's a tight fit, but she makes it through

1123312221221211112211111111223211112222.content:
As Anna attempts to squeeze through the gap, she nears the entrance where her foot slips and she falls onto the ground. She got up uninjured but as she looked down at her clothes, they had collapsed from the fall leaving her in her bra and panties and with toe holes in the front of her shoes, leaving almost her entire body exposed.
Her friends gasped at how easily her clothes had come off and felt sorry for Anna as they all knew what was coming.
As Sarah came out, she only ended up ripping her Crop top shirt to open up the sleeve hole and exposing her sides, other than that, her clothes were completely undamaged.

Feeling extremely risky, she puts on the pink sports bra and a pair of black short shorts. Wondering what her friends would say when she walked out, she sees them both being tickled by a red slime in the middle of the room. Anna was in her bra barefoot with her pants down to her knees being held in the air upright by her wrists and ankles while Megan was left in the same outfit with her shirt only around her neck, pants all the way off, and in the same position but lying flat on the ground.
"Your friend Anna was a little too hasty in choosing the surprise challenge" the Mistress explained "Now they have to defeat the slime before it manages to strip them of their shirt pants and shoes, but it seems they've already lost."
"What happens if we lose?"
"I get to take an article of clothing of my choice until the next safe zone." she replied in a devious tone.
The slime's tentacle then begins to slither up to Sarah's foot and...
112331222122121111221111111122321112.title: Sports bra, loose short-shorts, loose sneakers

11233122212212111122111111112232112.content:
Sarah looks at the skin she's already showing, and decides her current shirt and shorts will do just fine for the moment. All she really needs to grab are some shoes, and she'll be set. She starts looking through the shoes, looking for that perfect pair to keep things risky, but not impossible.

What does she find?
11233122212212111122111111112232112.title: Just find some shoes

choices: She meets with Anna and Megan, and they choose something
112331222122121111221111111122321121.content:
Sarah browsed through the racks of shoes for a moment, looking for that perfect pair of shoes. It didn't take her long to find a pair that called to her, and she squealed in delight as she grabbed them.

They were a pair of flat sandals, with a couple of quarter-inch wide straps that went over the ball of her foot, just behind her toes, and two more at the heel. The heel straps attached to the sole just in front of her heels, to either side, and were designed to be pulled around the back of her feet, just above her heels. They crossed there, then wound around her ankle a couple of times, and were tied off. The soles were unique, too. They were a very thin piece of leather, maybe 1/8th of an inch thick. That leather was cut so that it was beneath the balls and toes, then narrowed to a half-inch wide strip under the outside part of her arches, then flared back out beneath her heel. Her arches were completely exposed from both the sides and below!

After winding the straps around her ankles and tying them, Sarah found that there was no way she could tie the sandals tightly enough to keep her heels in contact with the soles of her shoes when she stood on her toes. No matter what, a half-inch gap always appeared beneath her heels. Her only concern was how flimsy they felt. Neither the straps nor the soles felt like they were made for much more than walking around town. She'd have to be careful, or she just might end up barefoot at an inconvenient time.

Sarah grinned as she wiggled her exposed toes! These new sandals were just what she had been looking for! She turned and walked out the door to meet Anna and Megan again.
112331222122121111221111111122321121.title: Some strappy flat sandals

1123312221221211112211111111223211212.content:
Sarah looked around the room in disbelief. Her friends were nowhere to be seen!

"Anna? Megan? Where are you?" Sarah's call was answered by the last voice she wanted to hear.

"They chose a challenge in which you each must travel your own path. Each one of you who makes it to another sanctuary room will earn a mark and be reunited with your friends. Good luck!" With that, the Mistress' voice faded away again.

Sarah swore under her breath, and looked back at the clothing room, realizing her tattered clothes and nearly-nonexistent sandals were not such a good idea without her friends to help her, but the door was gone. The only option she had left was to go forward, and hope for the best.

Who do you want to follow?
1123312221221211112211111111223211212.title: Anna and Megan are gone!

choices: Sarah decided to make a run for it!
Sarah can't afford a mishap.  She'll avoid the vines without running.
11233122212212111122111111112232112123.content:
A deep sense of trepidation settled in her stomach as she stepped out of the sanctuary, into what felt like a muggy, humid wall. The door disappeared behind her. Her path through the labyrinth looked like a jungle. Leaf-covered vines covered the walls, creeping through thick, tall grass towards the narrow line of the path before her. It was an old, decrepit stone path, made up of a bunch of randomly-sized stones seemingly just thrown down in no particular order. None of it was even, and entire sections of the stone seemed to have been swallowed by the muddy ground beneath them. Sarah shuffled her feet gently, feeling the texture of the stones beneath the extremely-thin soles of her flimsy sandals, as she realized their smooth soles afforded nearly no traction.

As she carefully started down the path, tentatively checking each stone before placing her foot down, she felt like there was something near her, though she couldn't tell what. She looked around, and realized the vines were reaching towards her as she walked! If she moved too slowly, they'd reach her. If she moved faster, she risked slipping and falling, or breaking her flimsy shoes. She could see an intersection in the path about 50 meters in front of her, that looked fairly clear.
11233122212212111122111111112232112123.title: Sarah

choices: She makes it, but damages her sandals
112331222122121111221111111122321121231.content:
Sarah pondered her options for all of a half-second, before deciding she'd have to make a run for it. If the vines were able to grab her, she had absolutely no one to keep her from being captured permanently.

Sarah broke into a sprint, her sandaled feet slipping on the uneven stones. She could feel the strain on the straps of the sandals every time her feet slipped, as the soles of her sandals flexed against the pull. A washed out portion of the path almost caused her to miss a step, but she managed to jump it awkwardly, almost falling as the stone she landed on tilted, but her momentum carried her further. She could see her destination drawing closer with every step...
112331222122121111221111111122321121231.title: Sarah decided to make a run for it!

choices: To the left, down the stone path
To the right, down the muddy track
1123312221221211112211111111223211212311.content:
Sarah continued running, jumping another patch of mud. Her destination grew closer, even as she leapt over a vine reaching for her ankle. Another loose stone almost made her fall sideways, but she managed to catch herself and continue her pell-mell dash for the intersection. One last muddy patch made her leap for all she was worth, barely clearing the mud as she almost botched her landing, stumbling into the intersection of the path.

Gasping for breath, Sarah wiped the sweat from her brow, as she looked back at the path she had just negotiated. The vines were still reaching for her, and she needed to get a move on again.

To her left, the broken stone path continued, though it seemed to be even more decrepit than before, and was lined with more of the grass and vines she had just run through. To her right, there were no stones, just an extremely narrow, muddy, puddle-dotted track leading towards what looked to be a pond in the distance. The trail looked fairly solid, and while it was still lined with tall grass, it didn't have any vines that she could see.

With no time to really ponder her choices, Sarah headed...
1123312221221211112211111111223211212311.title: She makes it!

choices: No time.  She heads left down the stone path.
No time.  She heads right down the muddy track
She risks trying to repair her sandals
1123312221221211112211111111223211212312.content:
Sarah continued running, jumping another patch of mud, feeling her sandals protest yet again as her feet slid sideways on the uneven stone. She dodged a vine reaching towards her from the front, stumbling as the toe of her left sandal snagged the edge of a stone. A faint *SNAP* accompanied that, and she suddenly felt the cold, smooth edge of the stone digging into her foot beneath her toes as she pushed off with her left foot, leaping over the last patch of mud into the intersection. A giggle escaped her lips as it felt like a dozen fingers had gotten beneath her toes, but the sensation was gone as fast as it had come.

That oh-so-brief tickle had caused her to go slightly off-balance as she jumped, the shock of it briefly breaking her concentration for a brief moment, and she landed heavily on her right foot, which slid sideways as she skidded to a halt in the middle of the intersection. Another *SNAP* sounded as her right heel suddenly slid off the leather sole, touching the smooth stone underfoot. Sarah laughed again, her ticklish skin feeling as though it had ants crawling over it, as she twisted her foot sideways to get her heel back on the sole of her sandal. She gasped for breath and wiped her sweaty brow, giggling slightly at the thrill of the run.

Looking back, Sarah could see the vines coming her way still, though it seemed she had a few moments before they would reach her. She took a brief moment to glance at her sandals, assessing the damage they had received. Her left sandal had broken a strap over the toe, leaving just one to hold it to the ball of her foot. Worse, she'd cracked the sole just behind her toes. It hadn't come off, just bent backwards, splitting the leather such that it flapped beneath her foot when she raised it. Her right sandal had broken the outer strap by her heel, right at the sole. While it was still tied, the one remaining strap wouldn't keep her heel on the sole.

Looking up, she could see the stone path continuing to the left, though it seemed to fall into even worse disrepair as it continued, and was lined with more grass and vines. To her right was an extremely narrow, muddy, puddle-dotted track, lined with tall grass. It didn't seem to have any vines on it, though, and appeared to head to a pond in the distance.

Looking behind her at the approaching vines again, Sarah debated whether she had a moment to try and patch her sandals up, or if she needed to move on...
1123312221221211112211111111223211212312.title: She makes it, but damages her sandals

choices: She misses a step and trips
The vines manage to grab her!
1123312221221211112211111111223211212313.content: A misstep? Vines grab her? Something else?
1123312221221211112211111111223211212313.title: Other options

choices: Sarah meets her friends, and they decide on a course of action
Sarah exits the room to find her friends gone!
112331222122121111221111111122321122.content:
Looking through the footwear options, Sarah wanted something a little risky, but still with some protections. Looking past the flats and heels, her eyes fall upon a pair of converse, not unlike Anna's. These were low-tops, instead of Anna's high tops, but the shoes seemed to have shorter laces than Anna's.

Slipping them onto her feet, and pulling the laces tight, Sarah noticed that the laces would barely pull through all of the lace holes. There was no way she would be able to tie these shoes without leaving them at least partially unlaced, and exposing her feet. Pondering this fact, Sarah decided to fully lace the shoes, but not tie them. She might have to stop more often to fix the laces, but she determined that it was better to do that than have her feet already easily exposed. Plus, she reasoned she could always tie them later.

Turning and walking out of the room, the untied laces of Sarah's newly found converse are already starting to loosen, but she does not yet notice as Sarah heads out to meet her friends.
112331222122121111221111111122321122.title: A pair of loose sneakers

choices: The rain was acid and began eating away at her shoes and clothes
The rain was slippery, and made her clothes and shoes hard to keep on
1123312221221211112211111111223211222.content:
Exiting the room, Sarah looks around to find that the space that she had just left from was now empty with no sign of Anna or Megan. "Anna? Megan? Where did you go?" She asked to the empty chamber, almost pleading for an answer. Silence was all that responded. With a sigh, Megan looked over the room, and saw that only one passage out remained, the other doors having disappeared or moved while she changed. "Well, guess there's not much of a choice now, is there..."

Walking through the passage, Sarah found herself back in the labrynth, with the walls now covered in ivy and moss. The open air brought down a humid breeze that brushed through her hair as she walked. After a few steps, Sarah could feel her heels begin to slip from her new converse, the laces having come further undone. While not in any percieved danger yet, Sarah kept it in mind, smiling to herself that the amount of risk that she was taking slowly increased the further she walked.

With a drop on her nose, Sarah looked up, and the dark, gloomy sky above her began to drizzle, and then lightly rain. "Great, just what I needed. My friends disappear, and now it's raining," she grumbled, as she quickened her pace, now looking for shelter. Her shoes loosely flopped on her feet, splashing in the now forming puddles as she advanced further. Little did she know that this was not any ordinary rain...
1123312221221211112211111111223211222.title: Sarah exits the room to find her friends gone!

112332.content:
"Well, Anna is going first, where do you want to go," asks Sarah. "I don't know, I am just going to wander around." answers Megan. "All right, anyway, I am going now, see you later." Said Sarah.

11233212.content:
Curious, I decided to try the door to my left.
         Big mistake! Something swings out of a deep recess beside me, on a thick chain, and latches onto both my arms. It's made of wood and kinda' resembles a pair of stocks, and now it's holding my arms above my head. I scream as the floor opens up, and I rapidly descend to the level below.
Above me, the light is snuffed out by the closing door, and the last thing I hear is the disembodied voice. It's laughing.
----- ----- ----- ------ ----- ----- ----- ------
         I awake in a standing position.
Being slack hurts my wrists, so I straighten up, noticing that my legs have been chained wide to two short pegs in the floor as I do. The entire room is small and square, with walls of red bricks, and brightly lit from some ineffable source overhead. Due to my hands being locked in stocks bove me, I've been strecthed out a little, and my dark shirt has rissen to just above my navel as a result. I feel a little nervous at that, as always I hate to expose my belly, particularily my bellybutton, due to how sensitive it is and its annoying habit of attracting tickling fingers.
Being this helpless...Well, anybody could come along and tickle me as much as they wanted and I couldn't do anything about it! Suddenly, I hear the voice say:"Alright, captive, you've wandered into my trap, and I've got a few surprises for you! I hope you enjoy my little tickle testing friends!'' I gulp at the sound of the 'T' word. I am so incredibly ticklish, and not just on my midriff. Everywhere on my body, from my long, brown-blonde hair to size 8 feet, is super sensetive!
         Startling me, two translucent, ghostly white hands appear in the air in front of me. I stare in amasement as they drift up to my belly,-and start tickling me! "Eep! Hahahahaha! Stohohop! Hahaha!" One hand is gently poking my side, while the other is lazily tracing patterns on the soft belly skin."Nohohoho! NotThereherhere! Pleheehease!" Instinctively, I suck in my tummy. One of the hands keeps poking around my navel, teasing me with the knowledge that the coming dip into that all-too-ticklish spot is inevetable, but not quite starting the torture yet.
         The other hand, though, drifts up to my smooth, helpless armpit, and starts lightly scratching! I twist side ways, forward, and back alternately, desperate to avoid them, but I just can't move around enough!
11233212.title: Tickling ghosts!(Or pieces of them)

112332121.content:
Another hand appears near my feet and start to take off my shoes I shriek and twist, still laughing. The hand near my stomach dives into my navel, making me scream and the other started lightly scratching my arches. Tears form in my eyes as I scream and buck, trying to get away.
"STOOPP hahahahahahahahah Plehehehhehehese I'll behave I swear!" I begged as the tickling intensified. Then, it stopped. I was released from the stocks and landed lightly on the ground. Panting, I grabbed my shoes and ran out of the room and into another. There-

info.description:
A group of girls decided to explore a mysterious house at the border of the great forest. However, inside the house, there is going to be somethings waiting for them. Ghosts, goblins, slimes, even monsters are going to show up to tickle those "little" ticklish girls. The girls are going to be in trouble. Maybe, after they get into the house, they will be able to come out, maybe not (get tickle and "fight" to come out). Maybe, they will wander inside to forest and tickled by those plants and weird animals.
First, please use your imagination and creative thinking to create a special story.
Then, really, I am not going to have too many characters, you guys who do read the interactive story may find out that no one would like to read a super short story with tons of characters. That may not be fun.
